attributes.action: follow these steps to reduce crime by none born British nationals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1) If a none British person commits a crime he/she and their dependants are to be returned to their birth place and not to be put in prision to waste UK tax payers money.
2) If this criminal is under 21 all blood relatives who have not been born in the UK, including their parents and grandparents, who were not born in the UK should also be deported at the same time.
This would be an incentive not to commit crime and reduce prison space.

rejection.details: Please make your title a specific call for action.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
